name: MannyTheFly - physic-based ragdoll puppeteer
description:
Dance simulator DEMO01:

This is a very early demo (test level) on purpose to get feedback from players = not just a family :)
The game is actually much more advanced than here (Dev Log updated soon)
I want to use many keyboard keys to control the puppeteer, but for now
You have access just to 4 controls (safe): 

H                          - popping
Spacebar         - jump like
Y                           - toggle hands up/down
Scroll mouse* - standing force (body tension up) - use it to vary the moves

*sensitive value, sorry but indicator went broken (will fix in the demo update) 

(other keys needs still some work before tests)
Please be comprehensible - it is WIP.
Put Your favorite music and try some moves :)
Thank You for your time. Hope You enjoyed.
Let me know - should I continue the development? I really need Your feedback and help later on in some crucial decissions.
...so if You like the 'concept' - follow me @Interference369 or fb.

Thanks and Greetings
Lucas

ps. I'm working on IOS & Linux demo now and dev logs to inform you more.

Demo music credit: Bowie - ArtOfWar
